name: Global Hunger Accelerator
desc: Satellite kitchens delivering shelf-stable meals to famine zones.

name: Coastal Resilience Trust
desc: Builds seawalls, mangrove nurseries, and evacuation networks.

name: Future STEM Scholars
desc: Endows robotics labs and provides mentorship for underrepresented youth.

name: Clean Water Grid
desc: Installs solar-powered purification hubs linked to mobile payments.

name: Wildlife Corridor Coalition
desc: Secures land bridges that reconnect jaguar and tapir habitats.

name: Mental Wellness Lifeline
desc: 24/7 multilingual crisis therapists and telehealth training.

name: Indigenous Rights Fund
desc: Supports land claims, language revitalization, and guardian programs.

name: Renewable Schools Initiative
desc: Retrofits rural campuses with solar microgrids and clean water.

name: Urban Food Forest Alliance
desc: Transforms vacant lots into community-owned farms and markets.

name: Veterans Reintegration Network
desc: Housing, job placement, and trauma counseling for returning service members.

name: Girls in Tech Accelerator
desc: STEM fellowships, hackathons, and founder bootcamps for girls.

name: Arctic Ice Defense
desc: Deploys reflective geoengineering pilots and climate sensors.

name: Humanitarian Airbridge
desc: Rapid-deploy cargo drones delivering medical kits in conflict zones.

name: Accessible Arts Endowment
desc: Funds inclusive museums, theater residencies, and community studios.

name: Future Farmers Fellowship
desc: Provides land leases and regenerative farming apprenticeships.

name: Refugee Innovation Lab
desc: Tech hubs inside camps powering education and micro-businesses.

name: Global Health Vaccine Fund
desc: Develops and deploys low-cost vaccines for emerging diseases.

name: Ocean Plastics Cleanup
desc: Deploys autonomous booms and upcycles plastics into housing.

name: Justice Reform Coalition
desc: Legal clinics and data transparency to reduce incarceration.

name: Solar Village Network
desc: Off-grid solar co-ops run by local women entrepreneurs.

name: Wildfire Recovery Brigade
desc: Restores forests, rebuilds homes, and equips community fire teams.

name: Digital Literacy Fleet
desc: Mobile labs teaching cybersecurity, coding, and AI ethics.

name: Maternal Health Collaborative
desc: Deploys midwife drones, training, and prenatal telemedicine.

name: Ocean Research Fellowship
desc: Funds deep-sea biodiversity expeditions and open data.

name: Global Literacy League
desc: AI-translated reading programs distributing tablets worldwide.

name: Accessible Housing Initiative
desc: Builds modular homes for people with disabilities and seniors.

name: Blue Carbon Conservancy
desc: Restores mangroves and seagrass to sequester carbon at scale.

name: STEM for Space Program
desc: Sponsor rocket camps, microgravity experiments, and scholarships.

name: Clean Cookstove Collective
desc: Replaces open-fire kitchens with efficient, low-smoke stoves.

name: Global Microfinance Catalyst
desc: Backs women-led cooperatives with inclusive fintech tools.

name: Youth Climate Leadership Lab
desc: Trains teen climate ambassadors with grants for local projects.

name: Rewilding Europe Initiative
desc: Reintroduces keystone species and funds ranger brigades.
